item.description: gfilt A CLI app to manage GMail filters Options -c, --credentials string path to credentials.json file -h, --help help for gfilt --log-level string set logging level (default "info") -n, --no-color disable colored output --skip-token-save skip writing OAuth tokens to disk

gfilt completion Generate shell completion Synopsis Generates shell completions. Supports fish, bash, zsh and powershell. gfilt completion [bash|fish|zsh|powershell] Options -h, --help help for completion Options inherited from parent commands -c, --credentials string path to credentials.json file --log-level string set logging level (default "info") -n, --no-color disable colored output --skip-token-save skip writing OAuth tokens to disk

gfilt help Help about any command Synopsis Help provides help for any command in the application. Simply type gfilt help [path to command] for full details. gfilt help [command] [flags] Options -h, --help help for help Options inherited from parent commands -c, --credentials string path to credentials.json file --log-level string set logging level (default "info") -n, --no-color disable colored output --skip-token-save skip writing OAuth tokens to disk

gfilt info Show notes and privacy information gfilt info Options -h, --help help for info Options inherited from parent commands -c, --credentials string path to credentials.json file --log-level string set logging level (default "info") -n, --no-color disable colored output --skip-token-save skip writing OAuth tokens to disk

gfilt version Display version information gfilt version [flags] Examples $ gfilt version --format=json $ gfilt version --short Options --format string output format (default "pretty") -h, --help help for version --short output just the version Options inherited from parent commands -c, --credentials string path to credentials.json file --log-level string set logging level (default "info") -n, --no-color disable colored output --skip-token-save skip writing OAuth tokens to disk
